biotools.summary: TRANSCOMPP is a tool that allows users to quantify phenotypic plasticity starting from single-cell or bulk measurements of phenotype. TRANSCOMPP uses Markov modeling and optimization to estimate best-fit values for stochastic transition rates, transition rate intervals, and phenotype-specific proliferation parameters.
